;; This file controls what Doom modules are enabled and what order they load
;; in. Remember to run 'doom sync' after modifying it!

;; NOTE Press 'SPC h d h' (or 'C-h d h' for non-vim users) to access Doom's
;;      documentation. There you'll find a "Module Index" link where you'll find
;;      a comprehensive list of Doom's modules and what flags they support.

;; NOTE Move your cursor over a module's name (or its flags) and press 'K' (or
;;      'C-c c k' for non-vim users) to view its documentation. This works on
;;      flags as well (those symbols that start with a plus).
;;
;;      Alternatively, press 'gd' (or 'C-c c d') on a module to browse its
;;      directory (for easy access to its source code).

** packages.el
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/packages.el
;; no-byte-compile: t; -*-
;;; $DOOMDIR/packages.el

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;  DO NOT EDIT DIRECTLY, THIS FILE IS AUTO-GENERATED WITH ORG-BABEL-TANGLE!  ;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

;; To install a package with Doom you must declare them here and run 'doom sync'
;; on the command line, then restart Emacs for the changes to take effect -- or
;; use 'M-x doom/reload'.

;; Orgmode
(package! org-autolist)
(package! org-appear)
(package! org-auto-tangle)

;; Claude Code
(package! inheritenv
  :recipe (:host github :repo "purcell/inheritenv"))
(package! claude-code
  :recipe (:host github :repo "stevemolitor/claude-code.el"))

;; Pulsar
(package! pulsar)

;; Mason
(package! mason)

;; Grease
(package! grease
  :recipe (:host github :repo "mwac-dev/grease.el"))

;; KDL language
(package! kdl-mode)

;; Ultra Scroll
(package! ultra-scroll)
#+end_src

*** Wiki (external config)
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
;; Load wiki workflow from separate tangled file to keep this config lean.
(let ((wiki-file (expand-file-name "wiki.el" doom-user-dir)))
  (when (file-exists-p wiki-file)
    (load! "wiki")))
#+end_src

*** User Information
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(setq user-full-name "James"
      user-mail-address "jamesyuli@outlook.com")
#+end_src

*** UI
**** Font
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(setq doom-font (font-spec :family "Sarasa Term SC Nerd" :size 16 :weight 'Regular)
      doom-variable-pitch-font (font-spec :family "Noto Sans CJK SC" :size 16)
      doom-unicode-font (font-spec :family "Symbols Nerd Font Mono" :size 16))
#+end_src

**** Theme
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(setq doom-theme 'doom-gruvbox)
#+end_src
**** Line Numbers
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(setq display-line-numbers-type 'relative)
#+end_src

      :map which-key-mode-map

***** Babel
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(after! org
  (org-babel-do-load-languages
   'org-babel-load-languages
   '(
     (elisp . t)
     (emacs-lisp . t)
     (lua . t)
     (makefile . t)
     (js . t)
     (css . t)
     (shell . t)
     (python . t)
     (rust . t))))
#+end_src

*** Claude Code
**** Configuration
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(use-package! claude-code
  :after inheritenv
  :config
  (setq claude-code-terminal-backend 'vterm)
  (claude-code-mode)
  :bind
  (:repeat-map my-claude-code-map ("M" . claude-code-cycle-mode)))
#+end_src

**** Key Binds
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(map! :leader :desc "Claude Code" "e" #'claude-code-transient)
;; (:prefix-map ("e" . "Claude")
;;  :desc "Start" "e" #'claude-code-transient))
#+end_src
*** Pulsar
Pulse highlight line on demand or after running select functions
**** Configuration
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(use-package! pulsar
  :init
  (pulsar-global-mode 1)
  :config
  (setq pulsar-delay 0.1
        pulsar-iterations 20
        pulsar-face 'pulsar-yellow
        pulsar-region-face 'pulsar-cyan
        pulsar-highlight-face 'pulsar-magenta)
  :hook
  ((next-error-hook . pulsar-pulse-line)
   (minibuffer-setup-hook . pulsar-pulse-line-blue)
   (consult-after-jump-hook . pulsar-recenter-top)
   (consult-after-jump-hook . pulsar-reveal-entry)))
#+end_src

#+RESULTS:

*** Mason
**** Configuration
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(use-package mason
  :ensure t
  :config
  (mason-ensure)
  ;; or
  :hook
  (after-init-hook . mason-ensure))
#+end_src
*** Grease
Oil.nvim but for Emacs - Editable buffer file manager.
**** Configuration
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(use-package! grease
  :commands (grease-open grease-toggle grease-here)
  :init
  (setq grease-sort-method 'type
        grease-show-hidden t
        grease-preview-window-width 0.4
        grease-preview-writable t))
#+end_src

**** Key Binds
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(map! :leader
        (:prefix ("o g" . "Grease")
         :desc "Toggle Grease"           "g" #'grease-toggle
         :desc "Open Grease (current)"   "o" #'grease-open
         :desc "Open at project root"    "h" #'grease-here))
#+end_src
*** KDL
Add support for =.kdl= files.
**** Configuration
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(use-package! kdl-mode
  :mode "\\.kdl\\'"
  :config
  (setq kdl-selection-method 'tree-sitter))
#+end_src

**** Enable highlighting in =org= code blocks
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(after! org
  (add-to-list 'org-src-lang-modes '("kdl" . kdl)))
#+end_src


*** Ultra Scrool
Smooth scrolling
**** Configuration
#+begin_src elisp :tangle packages/doom/.config/doom/config.el
(use-package! ultra-scroll
  :init
  (setq scroll-conservatively 3
        scroll-margin 0)
  :config
  (ultra-scroll-mode 1))
#+end_src
